titleStmt.title: The diseases of the time, attended by their remedies. By Francis Rous
titleStmt.author: Rous, Francis, 1579-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby for Iohn Parker, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the three Pigeons,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the three Pigeons
